title: Raby Vacant Grazing Allotments (Bureau of Land Management Nevada State Office)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all reports, lists, Email communications, white papers, or other records sent or received by Jon Raby that reference vacant grazing allotments on BLM land in the West. This request also seeks any reports, lists, white papers, email communications or other records sent or received by Jon Raby that reference any Trump administration plans to fill vacant grazing allotments across BLM land in the West. This request seeks records produced since January 20, 2025. 

I am a reporter for High Country News and other outlets.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jimmy Tobias

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: BLM Staff Contact List
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of the most recent contact lists, including lists of names and official emails, for BLM staff, including staff at headquarters, regional offices and field offices.

I am a reporter for The Guardian and other outlets.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jimmy Tobias
